name: FIVE NIGHTS TO SURVIVE
description:
ENGLISH

FIVE NIGHTS TO SURVIVE (BETA: ONLY NIGHT 1 AVALIABLE :B)

Five Nights to Survive is an exciting FP game. Your objective is to collect all the log and fire up the campfire before cold night come. To achieve the best results, strategically choose your logs Each wood log you pick up decrease your speed. 

Good Luck!

Controls
Movement - WASD or Arrows
Pick up - Use the Mouse

Credits
Programmer: @POCKET GAMES
Composer:  Zipyann (Discord: Zipyann#5669)
3d Modeler: Zingy (Discord: Zingy#4767)

Assets
3d Scene Terrain: Green Forest by PurpleJu
Tent, Ax & Campfire: PolyLite Survival Collection by ANIMPIC STUDIO
